MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY21 postcode area of Berriew, affecting properties in Berriew and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30PM, due to the repairs required to a grounded overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35PM on 10th April 2021.
